title: Adelaide's War
description: Isolation has become Adelaide Warren's solace. She lives far from civilization, up in the hills of West Virginia, after the end of the Civil War and the death of her husband. When Josiah Hamilton finds his way to her doorstep, nearly frozen to death one stormy winter night, she nurses him back to life.They form a fast friendship, which soon becomes more. When Josiah professes his love for her, she refutes him. But when tragedy strikes, itâ€™s Josiah who comes to her rescue. Now, Adelaide is forced to confront her love for him which she has both denied and hidden.A proposal is made. Will she accept him? If she does, what does that mean for her future?
author: Vivian Kees
